field_paragraph_text.value:
The project description section is where you tell others what you do; what your activities are. This is where you answer in greater detail what your mission statement is, what you exist to do. Here you tell others what you do (your activities) and who you are serving. Your project description can include the details that you were unable to have in your mission statement. Most likely, your project description is not going to change much over time.

To write a project description, think of important details about your work that you would tell someone if you had a few minutes to speak with them. This is not a place to write several pages of description; it is still brief but more precise, and answers some questions (but not all!):
